m_szDocSumamry: Infrastructure cess fumes automakers, car prices to go up over Rs 1 lakh PTI, New Delhi |  Updated: Feb 29, 2016 22:20 IST Prices of mass market vehicles may go up by up to Rs 2,000 more, while big diesel SUVs and sedans may get costlier by over Rs 1 lakh due to the infrastructure cess of up to 4%.      (HT File Photo) Share Finance minister Arun Jaitley’s call to levy an ‘infrastructure cess’ of up to 4% is set to cause a hike prices of mass market vehicles by up to Rs 2,000 more, while big diesel SUVs and sedans may get costlier by over Rs 1 lakh.
